title: The Drugging Of Our Children (2005) Documentary XviD AVI
description: The Drugging Of Our Children (2005) Documentary XviD AVI.avi - 1h 43min 4s 320 x 240 https://extraimage.net/images/2018/09/27/a3cc338a2fbf99eec9a7bdbd843474eb.jpg Some doctors are wary of prescribing medication for ADD or ADHD, especially when treating young patients—but the majority rely on psychotropic drugs. This program challenges the status quo, supported by a staggering amount of testimony and documentation. Incorporating detailed interviews with psychiatrists, neurologists, and education experts—as well as parents and kids who have suffered because of rigid prescription practices—the program analyzes links between school procedures, the medical establishment, and Big Pharma. Footage from the 1998 Consensus Development Conference on ADD/ADHD raises disturbing questions about how the disorders are diagnosed. Please share this information far and wide, burn the video to DVDs/Blu-ray discs or put it on USB Flash Drives and give them out to friends, family and others.
